about_the_game:
Real-Time Card Battle with Magical Energy

A real-time card battle game where you defeat enemies using magical energy that builds over time. Unlike traditional systems, there’s no concept of "turns" here.

Real-Time Card Battle

In this game, you use magical energy—akin to "mana"—to play cards and defeat enemies. However, there are no "turns." Instead, magical energy regenerates over time. You can freely decide when to play cards, while enemies also attack in real-time, giving you only a few seconds to respond.

Buff yourself for massive damage, counter enemy attacks with defensive cards, or poison your foes and let them fall without lifting a finger. The choice is entirely up to your deck’s strategy.

Roguelite Deck-Building

In this game, cards represent fragments of the protagonist’s memories. With each use, the memory fades, and the card will eventually vanish, as there’s a limit to how many times a card can be played. After each battle, you can acquire new cards or discard unwanted ones to strengthen your deck.

In this fluid cycle, aim to build the ultimate deck that’s uniquely yours.

Diverse Game Modes

Alongside the narrative-driven "MAIN STORY," the game includes modes like "Time Attack," where you freely construct your deck, and "ENDLESS," where you challenge endless battles to see how far you can go. Master every mode and unlock all achievements!

Unlockables

As you progress, new cards become available through story completion, achievement unlocks, and more. These cards can be added to your deck, expanding your strategic options and enhancing your gameplay.

A Story of Banishing Nightmares

The protagonist, Haku, is drawn into mysterious events on an island. With her hidden dream-demon powers, she must banish the nightmares that threaten to consume the land.
